Address.label: Address
Address.value: LE MILLENIUM 9, BOULEVARD CHARLES III, MONACO, 98000, Monaco

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Scorpio Tankers Inc is a shipping company. It is engaged in providing the seaborne transportation of refined petroleum products. It serves its end users in the petroleum supply chain by distributing products such as gasoline, heating oil, and fuel oil from refineries.
